Welcome to the MGA Cyberknights


The MGA Cyberknights are a student and alumni-led organization formed to further students’ understanding of Cybersecurity concepts and represent MGA in national and international cyber-related competitions.


Current or Upcoming Events

Stay up to date on any current or upcoming events! The Calendar will keep you informed regarding meetings, Capture the Flag Challenges, or any other special events.

If you want to learn more about some of the results and highlights from past events or challenges, click on the button below!


Capture the Flag Challenges

As mentioned above, the MGA Cyberknights take great pride in paticipating in and completing Capture the Flag Challenges. If you would like to learn more about what Capture the Flag Challenges are and some of the methods, tools, and techniques used in these challenges, check out the CTF Challenges page.

The Armory

Many CTF Challenges incorporate many different tools, programs, methods, and other concepts from Information Technology outside of Cybersecurity or Penetration Testing. Therefore, we working on and compiling an expansive list of various links, Linux Distributions, and all-around helpful tools that anyone interested in Information Technology will find useful.

We have aptly named that list
The Armory

Contact Us

If you would like to get in touch with us, one of the best ways to do that is through the MGA Cyberknights Discord server, which serves as our main medium of communication outside of the weekly meetings. However, you can always send us an email through the Contact Us page.


Join the MGA Cyberknights,
TODAY!

If you would like to build connections with like minded people who share similar interests, let us know. There are no membership fees, dues, or anything of the like.

If you are interested in competing in Capture the Flag Challenges, want to learn more about Cybersecurity and IT in general, or you just want to some fun,

join the MGA Cyberknights
